sen.e: Taking this opportunity, the three kugyo (court nobles) or government officers, who were relatives of the Kujo family, returned to the national political world.

sen.j: 一条家の当主一条信能（能保の子）やその甥の一条頼氏（高能の子）も後鳥羽院の院近臣に取り立てられ、三左衛門も赦免を受けたが、後鳥羽院に疎まれていた文覚のみは現地で客死している。
sen.e: Nobuyoshi ICHIJO (Yoshiyasu's son), the head of the Ichijo family, and Yoriuji ICHIJO (Takayoshi's son), his nephew, were also employed as trusted personnel of Gotoba-in, and the San-saemon persons were pardoned as well, but Mongaku alone, who was disliked by Gotoba-in, died in the exile.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Nobuyoshi ICHIJO (Yoshiyasu's son), the head of the Ichijo family, and his nephew, Yoriuji ICHIJO (Takayoshi's son), were also employed as trusted personnel of Gotoba-in: the San-saemon trio were pardoned as well, but Mongaku alone, who was disliked by Gotoba-in, died in exile.
sen.cmt: Yoriuji ICHIJO (Takayoshi's son), his nephew の表記を、his nephew, Yoriuji ICHIJO (Takayoshi's son) に変更しました。Gotoba-in 以下をコロンで区切り文を続けました。文末の余分な余白を削除しました。
sen.e: Nobuyoshi ICHIJO (Yoshiyasu's son), the head of the Ichijo family, and his nephew, Yoriuji ICHIJO (Takayoshi's son), were also employed as trusted personnel of Gotoba-in: the San-saemon trio were pardoned as well, but Mongaku alone, who was disliked by Gotoba-in, died in exile.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 後鳥羽院は依然として鎌倉幕府に不満を抱いていた。
sen.e: Gotoba-in still had complaints against the Kamakura bakufu.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Gotoba-in still had complaints against the Kamakura bakufu.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: Gotoba-in still had complaints against the Kamakura bakufu.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: しかしながら、親幕府派とされた九条家・西園寺家・中御門流一条家が後鳥羽院政を支える構造の形成と親朝廷派とみなされた源実朝の将軍就任によって幕府と対立する表立った理由が失われる。
sen.e: However, as Gotoba-in's government structure based on the support of the Kujo family, the Saionji family, and the Ichijo family in the lineage of the Nakamikado family became to be formed, and as MINAMOTO no Sanetomo, considered belonging to the Imperial court group, assumed the shogun post, the Imperial court lost the reasons to confront the Kamakura bakufu.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: However, as Gotoba-in's government structure came to be formed (based on the support of the Kujo family, the Saionji family, and the Ichijo family in the lineage of the Nakamikado family), and as MINAMOTO no Sanetomo, who was considered to belong to the Imperial court faction, assumed the shogun post, the Imperial court lost reasons to confront the Kamakura bakufu.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処がなされているため、原文の「理由が失われ、」を「理由が失われた。」にしました。 as Gotoba-in's government structure based on the support of the Kujo family, the Saionji family, and the Ichijo family in the lineage of the Nakamikado family became to be formed, を as Gotoba-in's government structure came to be formed (based on the support of the Kujo family, the Saionji family, and the Ichijo family in the lineage of the Nakamikado family), と書換えました。
sen.e: However, as Gotoba-in's government structure came to be formed (based on the support of the Kujo family, the Saionji family, and the Ichijo family in the lineage of the Nakamikado family), and as MINAMOTO no Sanetomo, who was considered to belong to the Imperial court faction, assumed the shogun post, the Imperial court lost reasons to confront the Kamakura bakufu.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: そして、実朝暗殺事件までは、朝廷と鎌倉幕府の関係は一応の安定期に入る事となる。
sen.e: Then the relationships between the Imperial court and the Kamakura bakufu remained stable anyhow until MINAMOTO no Sanetomo was assassinated.
Relationships between the Imperial court and the Kamakura bakufu remained stable until MINAMOTO no Sanetomo was assassinated.
sen.cmt: 同理由で、原文に「そして、」を加えました。 Then the を削除しました。until と MINAMOTO 間にある余分な空白を削除しました。
sen.e: Relationships between the Imperial court and the Kamakura bakufu remained stable until MINAMOTO no Sanetomo was assassinated.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: なお事件発覚の際に、文覚が保証人となることで一命を救われていた平六代（平維盛の子）も文覚に連座して処刑された。
sen.e: TAIRA no Rokudai (a son of TAIRA no Koremori), who escaped death due to Mongaku's guarantee when the incident was exposed, was killed together with Mongaku.
TAIRA no Rokudai (a son of TAIRA no Koremori), who escaped death due to Mongaku's guarantee when the incident was exposed, was killed together with Mongaku.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: この事件のとばっちりを受ける形で、無関係であった平家一門の嫡流は断絶することとなった。
sen.e: In repercussions of this incident, the direct descendant family of the Taira clan became extinct.
As repercussions for this incident, the direct descendant family of the Taira clan, which had nothing to do with the incident, ended up breaking off.
